title: Chain Upgrade
summary: This is v0.24 software upgrade for the Synternet Protocol Testnet
details:
This is v0.24 software upgrade for the Synternet Protocol Testnet.

If upgrade proposal passed, it would commit the Synternet Protocol Chain to halting the Synternet Chain application binary at block height 8883484 (approximately 14:00 UTC on June 12th 2025) and starting the new Synternet Chain application binary. Synternet Chain node operators must have already prepared the correct binary before the Synternet Chain halts and be ready to launch it after the Synternet Chain halts. For more information on deploying and managing validator binaries: https://docs.synternet.com/docs/for-validators/Mainnet/becoming-a-validator.

This upgrade proposal adds a few key improvements:
- Functionality to burn coins.
- Pricing supports pay-per-message.
vote_option_context: Voting positively will halt the chain at proposed height and require running v0.24.0 binary. Voting negatively will postpone the upgrade.
